column4: need some direction in setting up apache2 in ubuntu, so I have a sites-available in /etc/apache2/, now is this a required "virtual host", and I need to add another "vh", or should I just change it appropriately?
seems each apache install can be very different, by what #apache tells me
you need a new VH for each distinct site.
actually, not technically true, but helpful...
just to clarify, I have a <vh *> tag beginning the file, so I would need to add to that tag, or create a <vh new> tag, to say, point to a users dir?
I'm confused about your vh setup
its just a normal new install setu
i have a default fle in /etc/apache2/sites-available
we can just join a random channel?
so that is close to whats listed in my default
